scripts.publish: DOCKER_PROD_TAG=$(cat package.json | grep version | head -1  | awk -F: '{ print $2}' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && docker build -t frontlinersnl/front-end-build . && docker tag frontlinersnl/front-end-build frontlinersnl/front-end-build:latest && docker tag frontlinersnl/front-end-build frontlinersnl/front-end-build:$DOCKER_PROD_TAG  && docker push frontlinersnl/front-end-build:latest && docker push frontlinersnl/front-end-build:$DOCKER_PROD_TAG
